StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateJpasSubmiterInfo2]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: ( @UserName varchar(50), @Name varchar(64), @Title varchar(32), @Phone varchar(16), @SON VARCHAR(4) ) AS IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [JPAS_SUBMITTER_INFO] WHERE [USER_LOGIN] = @UserName) BEGIN UPDATE [mcriss].[dbo].[JPAS_SUBMITTER_INFO] SET [USER_LOGIN] = @UserName ,[SUBMITTER_NAME] = @Name ,[SUBMITTER_TITLE] = @Title ,[SUBMITTER_PHONE] = @Phone ,[SON] = @SON WHERE [USER_LOGIN] = @UserName END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [mcriss].[dbo].[JPAS_SUBMITTER_INFO] ([USER_LOGIN] ,[SUBMITTER_NAME] ,[SUBMITTER_TITLE] ,[SUBMITTER_PHONE] ,[SON]) VALUES (@UserName ,@Name ,@Title ,@Phone ,@SON) END
